channel.title: Comments for page "Final Fight"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Final Fight"

item.title: Update
item.content:encoded:
After 11 changed the amount of of stam per day (everyone +100), now the stam should be 280.
Edit: Fixed

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
The failure message for Part 1 is:

They shake their head - you'd need your bloodline (RedEye, WhiteEye, or Legacy - no funny business, you! These chumps don't know about any of the other ones!) to be considered.

You Failed!

Edit: This is for the bloodline check, which is now Part 1 instead of Part 4.

Edit 2: Tried the quest with an S1 Genin with the Mysterious Power Bloodline and without the starter bloodlines.

item.title: Change of order
item.content:encoded: It's been changed, Part 4 is now Part 1 and the other parts follow as before (1 -> 2 and so on). The success messages have moved along with the requirements (Part 1 success = "They look over your exploits approvingly" and so on).
